title: Ecommerce Site
description: This project required me to build a fully functional full stack E-commerce site to the designs provided. The site features register, login and edit profile functionality, as well as functionality to filter products based on clickable tags. The site also includes functionality to place order using payment options. I used CSS, React, Redux Toolkit, and ExpressJS for development
descriptionGPT: In this ambitious project, I developed a comprehensive full stack E-commerce site from scratch. With focus on user experience, I integrated essential features such as user registration, login, and profile editing. To enhance product discoverability, I implemented dynamic filtering using clickable tags, enabling users to find what they love effortlessly. To ensure smooth transactions, I integrated secure payment options, enabling users to confidently place orders with ease. Utilizing my expertise in CSS, React, Redux Toolkit, ExpressJS and MongoDb I developed a robust and responsive platform that embodies the essence of modern E-commerce. This project epitomizes my ability to deliver sophisticated full stack solutions, blending my front-end skills with back-end functionality.
